document_data.mainbody:
Hugo Hobbs, or Hobbs the Cobbs, was one of the inhabitants of Reithwin, once a Sel√ªnite town in the Western Heartlands, sometime before the late 14 century DR.
Hugo Hobbs perished sometime before the fall of Reithwin and it being consumed by the Shadow-cursed Lands before the . He was buried in Reithwins graveyard behind the House of Healing. His tombstone read "Dedicated to Hugo Hobbs, cobbler. Hobbs the Cobbs to his friends." Hugos grave marker remained undamaged as of the .
